resources.name: Science Laboratory
resources.description: Fully equipped modern science lab with microscopes, specimens, and interactive learning tools for hands-on experiments.
resources.features: Safety equipment, Chemical storage, Interactive displays

resources.name: Computer Lab
resources.description: State-of-the-art computer lab with 40 workstations, high-speed internet, and educational software for digital learning.

resources.name: Music Room
resources.description: Creative space equipped with various musical instruments, sound systems, and practice areas for music education.

resources.name: Library & Media Center
resources.description: Extensive collection of over 10,000 books, digital resources, and quiet reading areas for independent study.

resources.name: Art Studio
resources.description: Bright and inspiring art studio with painting, drawing, and sculpting materials for creative expression.

resources.name: Gymnasium
resources.description: Indoor sports facility with basketball courts, volleyball nets, and equipment for physical education and sports.

resources.name: Outdoor Playground
resources.description: Safe and modern playground with slides, swings, climbing structures, and soft-surface ground covering.

resources.name: Robotics Lab
resources.description: Advanced robotics and STEM lab with programmable robots, 3D printers, and engineering tools for innovative learning.

resources.name: Cafeteria
resources.description: Spacious dining area serving nutritious meals with options for various dietary requirements and preferences.
resources.features: Healthy meals, Dietary options, Modern kitchen

resources.name: Kindergarten Classroom
resources.description: Colorful and engaging learning environment designed specifically for our youngest learners with age-appropriate materials.
resources.features: Learning centers, Play areas, Interactive boards

resources.name: Auditorium
resources.description: Professional theater space with stage, lighting, sound system for performances, assemblies, and special events.

resources.name: Soccer Field
resources.description: Full-size soccer field with goal posts, spectator seating, and maintained turf for team sports and practice.

resources.name: Innovation Hub
resources.description: Collaborative workspace with virtual reality equipment, tablets, and interactive displays for project-based learning.

resources.name: Garden & Nature Area
resources.description: Educational garden space where students learn about plants, ecosystems, and environmental responsibility through hands-on activities.

resources.name: Multipurpose Room
resources.description: Flexible space for various activities including PE classes, events, meetings, and after-school programs.

resources.name: Reading Corner
resources.description: Cozy reading space with comfortable seating, diverse book collection, and quiet atmosphere for literacy development.
resources.features: Bean bags, Book collection, Quiet space

resources.name: Basketball Court
resources.description: Outdoor basketball court with regulation hoops, painted court lines, and LED lighting for extended play hours.

resources.name: STEAM Lab
resources.description: Integrated Science, Technology, Engineering, Arts, and Mathematics lab promoting interdisciplinary learning and problem-solving.
resources.features: Maker supplies, Tech tools, Project space
